com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.edition
Class PKTable

java.lang.Object
  com.hardcode.gdbms.engine.data.edition.PKTable

public class PKTable
extends java.lang.Object

Data structure to relate the primary keys of a table with the location of the corresponding record during edition. This primary keys are accessed by index.

Author:
Fernando González Cortés

Method Detail

addPK

public void addPK(int pkIndex,
                  ValueCollection pk,
                  int actualIndex)
Adds the 'pk' primary key to the 'pkIndex' index pointing to the 'actualIndex' location in the original table. Usually actualIndex and pkIndex will be the same number

Parameters:
pkIndex - index of the pk
pk - primary key
actualIndex - location of the PK at the original source

deletePK

Deletes a pk

Parameters:
index - index of the PK to delete

actualIndex - new position
